entry.title: Touch - 3" Plastic Swords Blue - 500 / Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Touch
Type: Disposables
Price: 8.99

Touch - 3" Plastic Swords Blue - 500 / Pack

Use this plastic sword food pick to add a classic, decorative touch to your sandwiches, appetizers, and samples. With its sturdy, durable construction and tip point, you can spear sliders, stuffed mushrooms, or mini meatballs for easy-to-grab individual portions. Plus, its length will allow your guests to easily hold their serving.

The pick's elegant color will accentuate your dishes and dinnerware. The blunt hilt end adds a decorative touch while the traditional design accentuates your foods. Use the pick to hold sandwiches together or garnish drinks for a professional presentation that is both functional and pleasing! Once your guest has finished their meal or drink, each pick is disposable so you can simply throw it away.

entry.title: MC - 30cm x 30cm White 1 Ply Lunch Napkin- 6000/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 36.99

Offer your guests convenience and comfort with this white Luncheonnapkin.

Great for restaurants, cafes, and outdoor events, this white napkin helps complete your basic table setting. With a classic, simple design you can use this napkin in a variety of venues, from a catered event to a casual diner. You can also use this economical, napkin to roll silverware for extra versatility in your busy establishment.

Smooth Sophisticated Material

Boasting a soft, absorbent construction, this napkin is a practical addition to any establishment. With its  design and large this napkin is perfect for cleaning up spills. It also easily covers patrons' laps to protect their clothing throughout their dining experience.

Great Value

Easily stock up on these economy napkins without breaking your budget! Whether you want to roll your silverware with these napkins or leave an extra stack of them at the table for convenience, they get the job done. Plus, they are a cost-effective solution for any restaurant or diner that wants to give out extra napkins without worrying about the cost!

Classic White Color

Thanks to its white color, the various hues of your dinnerware and tabletop décor will pop! You cannot go wrong with this universal color.

Pre-Folded

This napkin comes pre-folded for efficient preparation so you can keep buffet lines stocked or quickly add table settings at your event.

MC - 30cm x 30cm White 1 Ply Lunch Napkin 1/4 fold - 12 x 500 / Case

entry.title: Lapaco - 10" Paper Grease Filter Cone - 50 / Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lapaco
Type: Disposables
Price: 25.99

Lapaco - 10" Paper Grease Filter Cone

This 10" paper cone oil filter is designed for use with 10" fryer oil cone filter holders. It's perfect for seasonal concession stands, snack bars, or sandwich shops that occasionally fry foods. The 10" paper oil filter cone is made from a 70 micron non-woven material with over-locking stitches for added strength.

Regularly filtering your fryer oil with a product like this one will help prolong the oil's life by removing contaminants that can cause off-tastes and oxidation. You'll save money since you won't have to replace the oil as frequently and will also deliver better-tasting fried foods for your customers.

entry.title: Touch - 9" Chopsticks Paper Wrapped 80-861 - 20 x 100Pack / Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Touch
Type: Disposables
Price: 79.99

Touch - 9" Chopsticks Paper Wrapped 80-861 - 20 x 100Pack / Case

Perfect for your restaurant, deli, catering event, or Chinese/Asian takeout venue, these chopsticks will allow guests to enjoy your ethnic food! Great for anything from traditional fried rice, lo mein, sushi, and other Asian cuisine, these chopsticks create a unique dining experience for your guests. These chopsticks are a fun and cultural alternative to traditional flatware in your dining or takeout establishment. They are great for all kinds of Asian cuisine.

These disposable utensils are eco-friendly and can be thrown away for easy cleanup. Quickly add them to a takeout bag of food or have them set out for customers to place on their food tray.
